attributes.action: Stop the growing nature of anti-competitive "exclusive" mobile phone deals, whereby mobile handsets are only available to one carrier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Exclusive" deals remove any real choice for the consumer, and means networks have a clear monopoly of certain products.
This can be seen with the Google G1 on T-mobile, the Blackberry Storm on Vodafone, the iPhone on O2, and various HTC handsets on Orange.
The customer is unable to vote with their feet, as they cannot get the products from any other supplier, without resorting to importing or running software which invalidates the phone's warranty.
